replacementPartsEnabled.fieldDescription: Must be checked to enable Replacement Parts
replacementPartsEnabled.name: ./enableReplacementParts

socialMediaEnabled.fieldDescription: Must be checked to enable SocialMedia
socialMediaEnabled.name: ./socialMediaEnabled

ratingsnReviewsEnabled.fieldDescription: Must be checked to display Ratings and Reviews count
ratingsnReviewsEnabled.name: ./customerReview

webCollageEnabled.fieldDescription: Must be checked to enable Web Collage
webCollageEnabled.name: ./enableWebCollage

disableWCMobile.fieldDescription: Must be checked to disable Web Collage in mobile view
disableWCMobile.name: ./disableWCMobile
disableWCMobile.text: Disable Web Collage Content in Mobile View

pageEnablecustReview.fieldDescription: Must be checked to enable Customer Review and Ratings
pageEnablecustReview.name: ./pageEnablecustReview
pageEnablecustReview.text: Enable Customer Review and Ratings Content

pageDisablecustReviewMobile.fieldDescription: Must be checked to disable Customer Review and Ratings in mobile view
pageDisablecustReviewMobile.name: ./pageDisablecustReviewMobile
pageDisablecustReviewMobile.text: Disable Customer Review and Ratings Content in Mobile View

showPageCRRSpinner.fieldDescription: Display Spinner till the Content loads
showPageCRRSpinner.name: ./showPageCRRSpinner
showPageCRRSpinner.text: Display Spinner till the Content loads

pageEnablequestAnswer.fieldDescription: Must be checked to enable Questions and Answers
pageEnablequestAnswer.name: ./pageEnablequestAnswer

pagedisableQuenAnsMobile.fieldDescription: Must be checked to disable Questions and Answers in mobile view
pagedisableQuenAnsMobile.name: ./pagedisableQuenAnsMobile
pagedisableQuenAnsMobile.text: Disable Questions and Answers in Mobile View

showPageQnSSpinner.fieldDescription: Display Spinner till the Content loads
showPageQnSSpinner.name: ./showPageQnSSpinner
showPageQnSSpinner.text: Display Spinner till the Content loads

releatedSearches.fieldDescription: Must be checked to enable Related Searches
releatedSearches.name: ./releatedSearches

ageGrade.fieldDescription: Must be checked to enable Age Grade
ageGrade.name: ./ageGrade

productPrice.fieldDescription: Must be checked to enable Product Price
productPrice.name: ./productPrice
